params.text: Inyosi kanye neNdlovu
Inyosi encane ilahlekile. UMnumzane ndlovu angasiza?
Ingabe uhlala esidlekeni?
Cha, inyoni ihlala esidlekeni.
Ingabe uhlala emhumeni?
Cha. Ilulwane lihlala emhumeni.
Ingabe uhlala esidlekeni?
Yebo, lesi sidleke siyikhaya lami.
Inyosi nendlovu bangabangane.

"Inyosi kanye neNdlovu" credits

This work, "Inyosi kanye neNdlovu", is a derivative of "The bee and the elephant" translated by Celia Bolam used under CC BY.  It is based on the Original story: 'ឃ្មុំនិងដំរី', by Long Ravy © Room to Read, 2015. 

Some changes were made to this work. "Inyosi kanye neNdlovu" is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.


Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
